articles.description: The FIDE Women’s Grand Prix 2022-23 is into its third leg, and it is a huge moment for Indian chess. The start to the event has been rocky. One of the participants, Zhansaya Abdumalik, has withdrawn from the tournament after reaching New Delhi and spending a …

articles.title: 'He will falter...': Star IND batter's staggering take on Suryakumar for WC team - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Veterans and experts have hinted towards wanting Indian team management to think otherwise for the No.4 slot for the ODI World Cup. And amid the talk, a star India batter has made a staggering remark on Suryakumar. | Cricket
